Desc.entry: A not-for-profit social enterprise specialising in music industry training courses for young people, women and girls. Project uses a dedicated studio and rehearsal space that is also available for commercial hire. Also runs an all women choir.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Studio and rehearsal facilities are available for hire on weekdays, nights and weekends, Tues 7-8.30pm (womens choir)

category.entry: CHILDREN AND YOUNG PEOPLE - LEISURE ACTIVITIES
